title: 日本ダービーの後に・前向きな言葉

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, fuu, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
.........
Naa~~... It's no good~.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that was a hot race.
The ending was a bit unexpected, though.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Hey, look over there!
Mihono Bourbon and Rice Shower are——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You've leveled up several times since the 'Satsuki Sho'.
I definitely felt it through your mark.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ——I won't lose in the 'Kikuka Sho'.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san...!
The audience gets excited by the two's conversation.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower's been chasing after Bourbon all this time, huh.
Both of them ran a really great race!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
The 'Kikuka Sho' is a long-distance race, right! This...
I'm looking forward to seeing Rice Shower shine!
Tokyo Racecourse was completely captivated by the presence of the two.
Meanwhile, Matikanetannhauser——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Aha~, I'm just,
this time it was completely just a close call, you could say.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ugh,
...I'm frustrated!

Matikanetannhauser is always serious, but
her once-in-a-lifetime 'Japanese Derby' was especially
amped up with determination.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
——Because I'm plain and ordinary!
I'm not special at all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But, but but...
The possibility of winning is a different story.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Because, even I
only want first place!
...But still, you can't always get the ending you want.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a race where I won't get another chance. So I really thought, I absolutely have to win.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, that's why, that's exactly why...!
Matikanetannhauser looks down. Her shoulders shake, and her fists clench tight--
As if waiting for the tears to come, the surrounding cameras close in, but--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: What's important is the next one, the next!
Her face, lifted with vigor, had the same cheerful expression as usual.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because there's a next time! I'll use this as a lesson and give it my all!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, did you see Matikanetannhauser's press conference?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: I saw it, I saw it. You know, I lost today too, so it really cheered me up.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: 'The next one, the next!' she said. Hehe. I want to be able to say things like that too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmph. So embarras~sing...!
Matikanetannhauser's forward-looking attitude and bright words touched the hearts of many people.
Next is the 'Kikuka Sho'. As always, I don't plan on losing.
